titles.title: Missed Opportunities in Science and Engineering Research Act of 2017
Missed Opportunities in Science and Engineering Research Act of 2017

To require reporting by the National Science Foundation on requests for funding research that were not granted and had the greatest potential for promoting scientific progress and advancing national health, prosperity, and welfare, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Research and Technology.

bill.summary:
Missed Opportunities in Science and Engineering Research Act of 2017
This bill requires the National Science Foundation (NSF) to report to Congress on the fiscal health of the NSF research enterprise and the volume of worthy but unfunded grant proposals submitted to the NSF in the preceding year.
